alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:32AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG MAY POSE A HAZARD TO MOTORISTS THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog is expected to continue through daybreak across parts of central Wisconsin. The fog will likely reduce the visibility to less than one quarter mile in places, resulting in locally hazardous travel conditions. If driving, be alert for abrupt changes in the visibility, especially in low-lying areas near rivers and streams where the visibility is likely to be especially poor. Always use your low- beam headlights when encountering fog, and maintain plenty of distance between your vehicle and other vehicles. Allow a little extra time to reach your destination and drive at a speed that will allow you to safely stop if you unexpectedly encounter an object or animal on the road.
